trans-unit.source: Provides a way to convert an <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageContext"></xref> to a format that can be serialized as XAML.
trans-unit.target: 提供方法來轉換<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageContext"></xref>成可以序列化為 XAML 格式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageContext> cannot be serialized as XAML.

To solve this problem, use the XPathMessageContextTypeConverter to convert an instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageContext> class to an instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.XamlIntegration.XPathMessageContextMarkupExtension>.
trans-unit.target: 若要解決這個問題，請使用 XPathMessageContextTypeConverter <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageContext> <xref:System.ServiceModel.XamlIntegration.XPathMessageContextMarkupExtension>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.XamlIntegration.XPathMessageContextMarkupExtension>的執行個體類別</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageContext>的執行個體轉換

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.XamlIntegration.XPathMessageContextTypeConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.XamlIntegration.XPathMessageContextTypeConverter"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Tests whether a context can be converted from one type to the type of this converter.
trans-unit.target: 測試是否內容可以從一個類型轉換成這個轉換子的類型。

trans-unit.source: A type that provides the format context.
The type to convert from.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the type can be converted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果可以轉換型別。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Tests whether a type can be converted into a target type.
trans-unit.target: 測試是否為型別都可以轉換成目標類型。

trans-unit.source: A type that provides the format context.
A type that provides the format context.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the conversion can be performed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果可以執行轉換。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Converts the provided context object into the XAML-serializable type of this converter, using the specified context and culture information.
trans-unit.target: 將提供之內容物件轉換成這個轉換子，並使用指定的內容和文化特性資訊的序列化 XAML 型別。

trans-unit.source: A type that provides the format context.
The information about a specific culture, such as calendars, and number formats.
trans-unit.target: 特定文化特性，例如行事曆和數字格式的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: The object to convert.
The result of the conversion process.
Converts the provided context object into the XAML-serializable type of this converter, using the specified context and culture information.
trans-unit.target: 將提供之內容物件轉換成這個轉換子，並使用指定的內容和文化特性資訊的序列化 XAML 型別。

trans-unit.source: A type that provides the format context.
The information about a specific culture, such as calendars, and number formats.
trans-unit.target: 特定文化特性，例如行事曆和數字格式的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: The object to convert.
The type to convert the `value` argument to.
The converted context.
